src:
El Cyber Monday también trajo buenos memes
05 Nov 2019 by Redacción Diario de Cuyo
Ayer lunes comenzó la octava edición del Cyber Monday, la iniciativa organizada por la Cámara Argentina de Comercio Electrónico (CACE), con la cual quienes estén interesados podrán comprar productos con descuentos y con distintas posibilidades de financiación.
Como siempre, las redes toman protagonismo y esta vez con varios memes al respecto, entre los que se destacan mensajes de quienes ya compraron algo, de los que aún no se deciden, de los que consideran que todo es una "trampa", y de los que piensan gastarse todo aunque no lo tengan.
text:
Cyber Monday also brought good memes
05 Nov 2019 by Cuyo Daily Writing
Yesterday Monday began the eighth edition of Cyber Monday, the initiative organized by the Argentine Chamber of Electronic Commerce (CACE), with which those who are interested will be able to buy products with discounts and with different financing possibilities.
As always, the networks take center stage and this time with several memes about it, among which are messages from those who already bought something, from those who have not yet decided, from those who consider everything to be a "trap", and those who think to spend everything even if they don't have it.
